import { React, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Field, reduxForm } from "redux-form"; import { CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CButton, CForm, CFormGroup, CLabel, CCardFooter, CRow, CCol, } from "@coreui/react"; import UserService from "../../../../../services/user.service"; const EditCuppingForm = (props) => { const { handleSubmit } = props; const [roastingProfile, setRoastingProfile] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { getData(); }, []); const getData = () => { let id = props.cuppingID; UserService.getDetailCupping(id).then((response) => { setRoastingProfile(response.data.roasting_profile.roasting_profile); }); }; return (

); }; export default reduxForm({ form: "editCupping", // a unique identifier for this form })(EditCuppingForm);
